text:
You're getting better little by little.
Your movements are way better than when you started!
But I've done it so many times already...

If you don't give up, you'll definitely get it!
Let's try a little more together!

Yeah... Naa-chan...
Tenka... I'll do my best...
Hehe, alright, let's get back to it right away!

But it's also important to change the approach, right?
Is there a better method?

Oh! How about trying a video camera? You might figure
out why your turns are off when you see it on video!

T-That's true...
Alright, let's give it a try...!
